author: Special Correspondent
text: A day after the embarrassing blackout during the presentation of the State Budget by Chief Minister Siddaramaiah on Friday, the Energy Department found that the power cut occurred due to a technical snag. The Chief Minister was forced to read the budget proposals using a cellphone torch. Not only did the situation leave the ruling Congress red-faced, but the incident highlighted a grim picture of the power situation in the State.
title: ‘Technical snag led to blackout’
